channel.title: Travian script
channel.description:
hello,
since travian is an other game i can't put it in script request
now letst start I've tryed to make a scar script for travian or at least a script ive been working for this about 2 weeks but i cant get it fixed:S
I i got a script of a frend of mine but thats for linux and the problem is that i dont have that so i was wondering is some1 could make one for me so i can get it work
this is the game www.travian.nl / www.travian.com
if its possible it should do this the script
- make building resource fields when there are enof suply's and when the building is finished make a new one - send attacks / raids to towns u can enter the coords of and keep attacking it till the resourcers are gone from that town also u need to enter previously how many troops u wanna send to each town - it needs to have a option to set wich tribe u are - rebuild troops when they die in an attack - and it must be able to change towns and do all of this in the other town
if u want to make do this for me i would be greatfull i will suply the info about the game to u

item.title: Travian script
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

hello,

since travian is an other game i can’t put it in script request

now letst start
I’ve tryed to make a scar script for travian or at least a script
ive been working for this about 2 weeks but i cant get it fixed:S

I i got a script of a frend of mine but thats for linux and the problem is that i dont have that so i was wondering is some1 could make one for me so i can get it work

this is the game www.travian.nl / www.travian.com

if its possible it should do this the script

  • make building resource fields when there are enof suply’s and when the building is finished make a new one
  • send attacks / raids to towns u can enter the coords of and keep attacking it till the resourcers are gone from that town also u need to enter previously how many troops u wanna send to each town
  • it needs to have a option to set wich tribe u are
  • rebuild troops when they die in an attack
  • and it must be able to change towns and do all of this in the other town

if u want to make do this for me i would be greatfull
i will suply the info about the game to u

Read full topic
